item.title: 特朗普为五角大楼选中亿万富翁范伯格为黑格塞斯打气

item.title: 纳斯达克 100 指数再平衡，特斯拉、Meta 和 Broadcom 权重下降
item.description: 在 2024 年科技股大涨使纳斯达克 100 指数达到前所未有的规模之后，全球最大的三家公司在纳斯达克 100 指数中的影响力有所下降。【原文：Three of the world’s biggest companies have had their influence reduced in the Nasdaq 100 Index after the giant technology rally of 2024 swelled them to unprecedented size.】

item.title: 美国国债收益率走高，长期债务不受青睐
item.description: 由于交易商继续认为美联储明年的降息步伐将放缓，以及当选总统唐纳德-特朗普执政后国家财政背景可能恶化，国债收益率周一上涨。【原文：Treasury yields rose on Monday as traders continue to see a slower pace of interest rate reductions by the Federal Reserve next year and the potential worsening of country’s fiscal backdrop under President-elect Donald Trump’s administration.】

item.title: 加拿大央行官员认为第二次巨额降息 "千钧一发
item.description: 加拿大央行官员承认，他们连续第二次降息半个百分点的决定是一个 "千钧一发的决定"，一些决策者最初倾向于降低较小的借贷成本。【原文：Bank of Canada officials acknowledged their decision to cut interest rates by half a percentage point for a second consecutive meeting was a “close call,” with some policymakers initially tilting toward a smaller reduction in borrowing costs.】

item.title: 纽约联储对关键回购机制的调整因其设计而受阻
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行计划在年底前开展额外的流动性操作，这将在资金市场趋于波动的时候提供所需的支持，尽管其当前的框架将限制这些措施的有效性。【原文：The Federal Reserve Bank of New York’s plan to conduct additional liquidity operations through the end of the year will provide needed support at a time when funding markets tend to be volatile, though its current framework will limit the effectiveness of the measures.】

item.title: 美国联邦通信委员会称 AT&T 可以用无线家庭电话代替铜缆电话
item.description: 联邦通信委员会提前送给 AT&T 公司一份圣诞礼物：允许该公司用新的无线座机技术取代旧的铜质家庭电话线。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission gave AT&T Inc. an early Christmas present: permission to replace old copper home-phone lines with a new wireless landline technology.】

item.title: 特朗普执政后，"兼并与破产世界 "看到了底层贸易复苏的曙光
item.description: 兼并套利投资者急于翻过 2024 年这一页，他们押注当选总统唐纳德-特朗普即将上任的政府将在充满交易延迟和失败的一年后重振这一饱受打击的策略。【原文：Merger-arbitrage investors are eager to turn the page on 2024, as they bet that the incoming administration of President-elect Donald Trump will revive the battered strategy after a year filled with deal delays and busts.】

item.title: 约翰-米勒的新型高收益债券基金将在 2024 年主导市场
item.description: 今年是高收益市政债券的丰收年，尤其是该类别的明星基金经理约翰-米勒（John Miller），他在纽文公司（Nuveen）工作了近三十年后，于今年 1 月加入了 First Eagle Investments。【原文：It’s been a banner year for high-yield municipal bonds, and in particular the category’s star money manager, John Miller, who joined First Eagle Investments in January after nearly three decades at Nuveen.】

item.title: 特朗普在运河控制权问题上的争执拖累巴拿马资产

item.title: 希腊与以色列签署地区能源稳定协议

item.title: 华尔街支持美联储，认为 2025 年美国债券收益率将下降
item.description: 尽管当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易和税收政策对债券市场的威胁迫在眉睫，但华尔街仍从美联储那里得到启示，预测 2025 年美国短期国债收益率将下降。【原文：Wall Street is taking its cues from the Federal Reserve, forecasting short-term US Treasury yields to fall in 2025 despite the looming threat of President-elect Donald Trump’s trade and tax policies on the bond market.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心下降，政治因素影响前景
item.description: 由于特朗普政府政策的不确定性导致人们对经济前景感到担忧，12 月份美国消费者信心指数出人意料地出现了三个月来的首次下滑。【原文：US consumer confidence unexpectedly sank in December for the first time in three months on concerns about the outlook for the economy amid uncertainty around the Trump administration’s policies.】

item.title: 美国 11 月新房销售在经历风暴袭击后出现反弹
item.description: 由于建筑商和消费者完成了因南方暴风雨而推迟的交易，而且购房者利用了大量的销售奖励措施，上个月美国的新房销售出现反弹。【原文：New-home sales in the US rebounded last month as builders and consumers sealed deals that had been delayed by storms in the South, and buyers took advantage of heavy sales incentives.】
